pr_title: Add default aggregateBy method to RichIterable that takes a target Ma…

timeline.bodyText: One request, can you add a method doc similar to the one above method?
timeline.author: prathasirisha
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2422,13 +2422,28 @@ default void appendString(Appendable appendable, String separator)
             Function0<? extends V> zeroValueFactory,
             Function2<? super V, ? super T, ? extends V> nonMutatingAggregator)
     {
-        MutableMap<K, V> map = Maps.mutable.empty();
+        return this.aggregateBy(
+                groupBy,
+                zeroValueFactory,
+                nonMutatingAggregator,
+                Maps.mutable.empty());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * @since 10.3

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/eclipse-collections-api/src/main/java/org/eclipse/collections/api/RichIterable.java b/eclipse-collections-api/src/main/java/org/eclipse/collections/api/RichIterable.java
index af2f5f83..b546a90d 100644
--- a/eclipse-collections-api/src/main/java/org/eclipse/collections/api/RichIterable.java
+++ b/eclipse-collections-api/src/main/java/org/eclipse/collections/api/RichIterable.java

@@ -2430,6 +2430,10 @@ public interface RichIterable<T>
     }
 
     /**
+     * Applies an aggregate function over the iterable grouping results into the target map based on the specific
+     * groupBy function. Aggregate results are allowed to be immutable as they will be replaced in place in the map. A
+     * second function specifies the initial "zero" aggregate value to work with (i.e. Integer.valueOf(0)).
+     *
      * @since 10.3
      */
     default <K, V, R extends MutableMap<K, V>> R aggregateBy(

timeline.bodyText: same comment as above with doc.
timeline.author: prathasirisha

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/eclipse-collections-api/src/main/java/org/eclipse/collections/api/bag/Bag.java b/eclipse-collections-api/src/main/java/org/eclipse/collections/api/bag/Bag.java
index ae35ffc0..5e2c9344 100644
--- a/eclipse-collections-api/src/main/java/org/eclipse/collections/api/bag/Bag.java
+++ b/eclipse-collections-api/src/main/java/org/eclipse/collections/api/bag/Bag.java

@@ -315,6 +315,12 @@ public interface Bag<T>
     }
 
     /**
+     * Applies an aggregate function over the iterable grouping results into the target map based on the specific
+     * groupBy function. Aggregate results are allowed to be immutable as they will be replaced in place in the map. A
+     * second function specifies the initial "zero" aggregate value to work with (i.e. Integer.valueOf(0)).
+     *
+     * This method is overridden and optimized for Bag to use forEachWithOccurrences instead of forEach.
+     *
      * @since 10.3
      */
     @Override

timeline.message:
Add default aggregateBy method to RichIterable that takes a target Map and remove some duplicate implementation code.

Signed-off-by: Donald Raab <Donald.Raab@bnymellon.com>

Add default aggregateBy method to RichIterable that takes a target Map and remove some duplicate implementation code.
